Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression of the L166P variant was reduced by 60% compared to the wild-type protein.
Readout description.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.
Readout description.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression of the M26I variant was reduced by 70% compared to the wild-type protein.
Readout description.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.
Readout description.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression of the R98Q variant showed no change compared to the wild-type protein.
Readout description.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.
Readout description.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 protein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Experiment Method.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.
Experiment Method.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.
